trans-unit.source: An unexpected error prevented the window from closing ({0}).
trans-unit.target: 由于意外错误，导致无法关闭窗口({0})。

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error prevented the application from closing ({0}).
trans-unit.target: 由于意外错误导致应用程序无法关闭({0})。

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error prevented the window from reloading ({0}).
trans-unit.target: 由于意外错误导致窗口无法重新加载({0})。

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error prevented the window from changing it's workspace ({0}).
trans-unit.target: 由于意外错误导致窗口无法更改其工作区({0})。
